ticket.title: ASICS changes: Top Navigation, Widgets, SportStyle, AYAMi
ticket.original-body:
Top Navigation 1. Change AYAMI => AYAMi
Widgets 2. Remove store locator widget from all product pages since there is the new store locator lead below the product description
ASICS SportStyle 1.Change line-height on ASICS SportStyle to about 1.0. Keep same space between title and description below. 2.Remove image filter for now. Maybe it will come back in the future.
AYAMi 1. Clicking an AYAMi hotspots click jumps to top of page 2. Change text in the Get Layering section from AYAMI => AYAMi
ticket.latest-body:
Top Navigation 1. Change AYAMI => AYAMi
Widgets 2. Remove store locator widget from all product pages since there is the new store locator lead below the product description
ASICS SportStyle 1.Change line-height on ASICS SportStyle to about 1.0. Keep same space between title and description below. 2.Remove image filter for now. Maybe it will come back in the future.
AYAMi 1. Clicking an AYAMi hotspots click jumps to top of page 2. Change text in the Get Layering section from AYAMI => AYAMi
ticket.original-body-html:
Top Navigation
1. Change AYAMI => AYAMi

Widgets
2. Remove store locator widget from all product pages since there is the new store locator lead below the product description

ASICS SportStyle
1.Change line-height on ASICS SportStyle to about 1.0. Keep same space between title and description below.
2.Remove image filter for now. Maybe it will come back in the future.

AYAMi
1. Clicking an AYAMi hotspots click jumps to top of page
2. Change text in the Get Layering section from AYAMI => AYAMi
